item.title: Automatically renew a free SSL certificate for your blog
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Background If you have a website or an independent blog, you need to care about the expiration of your website’s SSL certificate every year. Recently, the wnote.com certificate is about to expire; Applying for an SSL certificate allows the website to support https access. There are free and paid ones on the market; For free certificates, domestic mainstream cloud vendors such as Alibaba, Tencent, ucloud and other platforms have free
